        public static void askDecimal(int digitsQuantity)
        This method takes care of asking for the digits one by one if our choice was decimal and makes sure that we wrote something correct, using the validation method for this. Also print the conversions
        Parameters:
        digitsQuantity, - this is the quantity of digits that the user entered by keyboard.

        public static java.lang.String binaryRest(int[] binary1,
                                          int[] binary2,
                                          int digitsQuantity1,
                                          int digitsQuantity2)
        Description: This method is the one we use to rest two binary numbers..
        Type Parameters:
        binary1 - , Means the array whith the digits that the user entered by console of the first number.-->
        binary2 - , Means the array whith the digits that the user entered by console of the second number.-->
        digitsQuantity1 - , Means the amount of digits that the first binary.-->
        digitsQuantity2 - , Means the amount of digits that the second binary-->
        Returns:
        , This is the one that is given by the method and it is the rest of the binaries.--> return
